Command.Name: BattleEye
Command.Title: Disable BattleEye.
Command.Description:
BattleEye is an anti-cheat software. It is incompatible with modding GTAV, and should be disabled for LSPDFR to function correctly.
To disable it, go to the **Rockstar Games Launcher** > **Settings** and **untick it**.

Field.Name: If this doesn't work, disable it manually.
Field.Value: Go to your GTAV folder and add the following to your commandline.txt: `-nobattleye`
